title: Strengthening Hospitality Practical Competencies: Biology-Based Data Utilizing Branching Interactive Videos

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can identify decision-making points required for solving biological problems with 80% accuracy through branched video scenarios.
Based on analyzing in-video choices, learners can modify and optimize a data analysis model three or more times while explaining the process.
Reflecting on branched learning experiences, learners can propose two or more improvement strategies for decision-making processes during peer evaluations.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
